_source.short_desc: Knowledge engagement software enabling teams to access, collaborate across, and draw upon their organization?s collective intelligence.
_source.long_desc: Bloomfire is the leader in knowledge engagement, delivering an experience that connects teams and individuals with the information they need to excel at their jobs. Our cloud-based knowledge engagement platform gives people one centralized, searchable place to engage with shared knowledge and grow their organization?s collective intelligence. For more information or to schedule a demo, visit www.bloomfire.com.
_source.target_audience: Bloomfire is perfect for any team, department, company or organization looking for a useful way to easily, collaboratively and meaningfully share knowledge.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers a smart knowledge base for self-service that integrates seamlessly into it?s help desk software. It can be used internally by agents for quick resolutions, and externally by customers to solve their own issues?on any platform. Companies that use Zendesk's knowledge base software can improve agent efficiency and reduce support costs by 50%. This industry leading customer support solution is easy to deploy, yet flexible enough to customize to your needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create a dynamic informational database your whole team can contribute to while they work with flexible knowledge management software.
related_products.features: Create a dynamic informational database your whole team can contribute to while they work with flexible knowledge management software. That way, important material never gets lost when people move between teams or roles, and your team guidelines and enablement documents are always up-to-date. Then easily navigate your knowledge base with custom statuses, hashtags, and filters to find exactly what you need in seconds.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk knowledge base helps customers to find answers on their own and enables agents to handle more customer queries efficiently. Some of the key capabilities include creating content in multiple languages, managing content in bulk to save time, using filters to work on specific content, setting up a robust approval process. It is also possible to leverage the AI-powered bots to help customers find relevant answers while keeping them engaged.

related_products.short_desc: Confluence makes information accessible to your whole organization. Use it to capture and preserve all important data and updates.
related_products.features: Making information accessible to your organization is important now more than ever. Confluence can serve as your company's primary Knowledge Management Software tool. Use it to capture, preserve, and organize your most valuable assets. Whether it be company updates, project plans, or other important intel, keep it accessible and trackable with Confluence.

related_products.short_desc: With Zoho Desk, create Multi-brand SEO friendly knowledge base articles on cloud for each of your brand to answer your customers FAQ's.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud based Knowledge base software for faster answers and fewer tickets on customer quires and complaints that helps your company to build stronger relationships with customers over multiple channels and languages. Create Multi-brand SEO friendly knowledge base articles for each of your brand to answer your customer's frequently asked questions. This saves your team work on responding to simple questions, and leaves more time to help customers with tricky problems.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features: LiveAgent is a complete knowledge management system that provides a fully-featured customer knowledge base. Our customer knowledge base enables customers to quickly find answers without having to submit tickets. Reduce customer wait times, the workload of your agents, as well as the time spent on resolving tickets. With LiveAgent, providing world-class customer service is easy. Start your free trial today, no credit card required.

related_products.short_desc: Notion is the only knowledge management software that connects your wiki, notes and projects in one tool.
related_products.features: Notion is the only knowledge management software that connects your wiki, notes and projects in one tool. Tens of thousands of teams and companies around the world use it to keep their employees informed and working together in one place. By bringing all work and knowledge together and making it highly customizable, Notion creates focus and transparency, while consolidating tools, saving time, and driving more productivity for teams of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
related_products.features: Help customers find the answers they need across any channel and empower your agents with the best answer to customer questions with the knowledge management solution that works across the world's #1 CRM. Help your customers get exactly what they need using a centralized knowledge base for all your agent and customer information.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 is a leading free social knowledge management and collaboration platform used by over 8 million companies worldwide.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is a leading free social knowledge management and collaboration platform used by over 8 million companies worldwide. Available in cloud and on-premise with open source code access. Share and discuss ideas, manage knowledge, manage projects and do more with Bitrix24!

related_products.short_desc: Speed up your IT process by using and creating knowledge base for your service desk software
related_products.features: Despite popular opinion, life as a service desk agent is as unglamorous as it can get. A support agent spends most of his time, answering the same set of questions over and over. Imagine answering "How do I reset my password?" fifty times a day; not only does this make their life incredibly monotonous but it also makes the end-user wait for an answer to a problem or query that actually could be solved in a jiffy with the right guide.

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: Replace your outdated knowledge management software with Axero. 100% useful. 100% customizable. 100% loved by millions of people.
similar_products.features:
Centralize all of your documents, resources, and employees in one place with Axero. Access your entire organization's consciousness, organize your valuable information, reduce employee questions, prevent knowledge loss, and provide that single source of truth that so many companies desperately need.

Axero's intranet software simplifies how work gets done and delivers custom knowledge management experiences for all your employees.

similar_products.short_desc: Build a powerful, interactive knowledge base for your employees or customers with Stonly.
similar_products.features: Build a powerful, interactive knowledge base for your employees or customers with Stonly. Make it easily accessible wherever it's needed. Forget static, linear help articles. Provide engaging, adaptive guidance that drives self-serve resolutions. See why 1,000's of companies trust Stonly to provide unparalleled support.

It even empowers your team to keep knowledge fresh and relevant by programmatically surfacing content that might be out-of-date.

similar_products.short_desc: Switch on knowledge management for legal professionals with Thomson Reuters? HighQ.

Dramatically improve how you plan, organize, track, and complete work more efficiently with personalized client portals and real-time access and insights on legal project work, ready-to-use task lists and templates, and automated workflow-enabled legal process maps.

similar_products.short_desc: IT Glue is an award-winning documentation platform, helping IT providers dramatically reduce wasted time looking for information.

Get relationship mapping, secure password management, and an automated and structured documentation framework to organize all your information. Have confidence in the security of your information with features like granular access permissions, version history, and more. Track any asset with ease for peace of mind.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Content Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Content Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Content Management (CMS) software (CMS) is used for managing digital content across the enterprise and often refers specifically to managing websites and editing web content. There are many different kinds of CMS solutions on the market including both open-source and proprietary solutions. Many Content Management solutions allow the creation, modification and removal of content from the web site without extended knowledge of HTML or the expertise of a webmaster. Content Management software is related to Catalog Management software and Portal software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Digital Adoption Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Digital Adoption Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Digital Adoption Platforms help organizations to onboard and train their customers, employees, partners, and prospects by delivering user guidances, walkthroughs, and tutorials for enterprise applications or websites.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Portal software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Portal tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Portal software provides a secure, common gateway to enterprise data and applications, enabling greater efficiency and range for business-to-business, business-to-internal and business-to-consumer transactions in both self-service and on-demand environments. Portal applications typically feature robust content management systems (CMS) allowing the distribution and presentation of key data throughout an enterprise, as well as collaborative work and document synchronization features. Portal solutions also provide integration to external database resources, sales and CRM tools and a variety of management reporting features. Portal software is related to Catalog Management software, Content Management software, Knowledge Management software and Web Collaboration software.

_source.short_desc: Knowledge engagement software enabling teams to access, collaborate across, and draw upon their organizations collective intelligence.
_source.long_desc: Bloomfire helps Market Research teams create a dynamic, shareable research library. Our platform makes it simple for insights teams to share their work and for stakeholders to discover the insights they need to drive business decisions. Bloomfire is used by hundreds of thousands of employees at leading companies such as Capital One, Southwest Airlines, FedEx, and HomeAway to increase the impact of their market research to make informed decisions, and drive results.
_source.target_audience: Bloomfire is perfect for any team, department, company or organization looking for a useful way to easily, collaboratively and meaningfully share knowledge.

related_products.short_desc: The ultimate market research tool: 95% of users get more data, more easily when they switch to Typeform
related_products.features: Get better market research insights with interactive forms that are actually fun to complete, and super easy to make. Typeforms are fully customizable to your brand, with a sleek interface that's responsive and asks one question at a time-just like a real conversation. Get useful insights and reports in your dashboard, plus 120+ integrations let you hook Typeform up to your favorite apps, so you can automatically send responses wherever you want, as they come in.

related_products.short_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top-rated market research tool to drive better decisions with real-time insights and reporting.
related_products.features: Faster results, deeper market knowledge with Qualtrics. Use market research tools designed to go deeper. From ad testing and product design to market segmentation and competitor benchmarking, our market research platform gives you not just the knowledge you need but the insights and actions to create transformative results. Go from 'what' to 'why' with deep processing and predictive capabilities including sentiment analysis and market trend reporting. Take control of your market research data.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

related_products.short_desc: Tango Card bundles simple technology, great rewards, and expert service to help companies get the most out of their reward programs.
related_products.features: Tango Card provides leading incentive-delivery technology to organizations in the B2B space. Globally, enterprise companies use this technology to deliver an extensive catalog of domestic and global e-gift cards as part of consumer loyalty programs, sales incentive programs, health and wellness engagement, and employee recognition. Tango Card believes instantly delivering the most desirable rewards maximizes impact and drives real business results.

related_products.short_desc: Survey software for the creation, distribution, and analysis of surveys, polls, and forms.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a SaaS survey solutions company offering applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Obtain accurate insights using conjoint analysis, MaxDiff analysis, sentiment analysis, TURF analysis, heatmap analysis, etc. Export data to external tools like SPSS and R Software and integrate with 20+ applications.

We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: MediaRadar is a customizable advertising intelligence platform that is targeted to the needs of media sellers, buyers, and planners.
related_products.features: MediaRadar's award-winning advertising intelligence solutions deliver timely cross-media insights that are targeted to those that are involved in the media selling, planning, or buying processes. Media selling teams rely on MediaRadar to prospect for new business, create compelling pitches and connect with the right buyers. Agencies and marketers use MediaRadar to create the best media mix, monitor their competitors, and uncover new advertising opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, a custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand audience.
related_products.features: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, our custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand your audience and make better decisions. Featuring nine question types, survey templates, email notifications, skip logic, and more, Nextiva Surveys provides the tools needed to measure respondents. Plus businesses can customize landing pages, thank you pages, colors, and everything in between! Seamlessly integrate with other Nextiva products for a full view of audiences.

related_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
related_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

related_products.short_desc: The most professional survey software for your company (NPS, Customer satisfaction, HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience)
related_products.features:
The most professional survey software for your company. Popular survey types:
- NPS, Customer satisfaction, 
- HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience, Exit Interview, Candidate Experience
- Website widget

related_products.short_desc: CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people.
related_products.features: You need answers, and you need them quickly. Whether you're conducting ad hoc market research, want to gather quick feedback on advertising or product concepts, or launching a sophisticated insights campaign as a seasoned researcher, CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SmartSurvey is an online survey solution that helps anyone create surveys, collect data and analyse results.
related_products.features: With the SmartSurvey SaaS platform, users can capture, analyse and report virtually any type of data via a simple, yet stylish, online survey service. SmartSurvey allows users to directly reach the people whose opinions matter the most, clients, partners, patients, students and suppliers. SmartSurvey specialises in providing survey solutions for multinational business and enterprise clients, offering dedicated support and secure data storage on UK/EU based servers.

similar_products.short_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top-rated market research tool to drive better decisions with real-time insights and reporting.
similar_products.features: Faster results, deeper market knowledge with Qualtrics. Use market research tools designed to go deeper. From ad testing and product design to market segmentation and competitor benchmarking, our market research platform gives you not just the knowledge you need but the insights and actions to create transformative results. Go from 'what' to 'why' with deep processing and predictive capabilities including sentiment analysis and market trend reporting. Take control of your market research data.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Increase your market intelligence with accurate insights delivered in days, not months. Deeply understand your market, elevate your brand, and build winning products with our purpose-built insights solutions--tailored to your industry, organization, role, or need. Contact us to learn about our market research solutions like industry tracking, competitive intelligence, concept and creative testing, pricing research, and brand tracking, or work with us to custom build your own study.

similar_products.short_desc: Access real-time data, through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy.
similar_products.features:
Cypris delivers actionable market intelligence to R&D and innovation teams. The platform analyzes and tracks over 500M+ data points from over 150 countries every day, including new entrants, patents, research papers, startups, and more.

Users access live data through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy and request custom reports based on specific research needs. Together, the innovation dashboard and custom reports serve as a dedicated research arm.

similar_products.short_desc: Cobalt provides unparalleled market insights that help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel.
similar_products.features:
Jungle Scout Cobalt is the leading market intelligence and product insights platform built to help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel. 

Cobalt provides the industry's most accurate Amazon sales data to empower ecommerce businesses with competitive intelligence, product and category trends, market share data, and actionable insights into consumer behavior.

similar_products.short_desc: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution. Built right into the SurveyMonkey platform, we've integrated with panels in over 100 countries to enable global consumer research anytime, anywhere, and for any budget. Target respondents by demographics, firmographics or custom screening questions, automatically launch projects on your schedule, and start seeing results in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Our mission is to help customers find, research, and connect with privately held companies - using data to transform the M&A industry.
similar_products.features: SourceScrub is the world's leading data service for firms looking to research, find and connect with privately held companies. Our Private Company Intelligence platform allows  deal teams to take a data-driven approach in a traditionally opaque segment of the market. We combine state-of-the-art technology with an unmatched QA process resulting in the freshest and most accurate data set available.

similar_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
similar_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the industry leader in market research rewards and incentives.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the leading provider of rewards and incentives for market research companies across the world. Attract and incentivize market research participants and instantly reward them with a catalog of gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. It's never been easier for market researchers to buy, track and manage digital incentives at scale. You can automate the process by integrating with our API, or send rewards individually and in bulk with the Tremendous platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Know your target market inside-out. Gauge market pulse, assess competition & keep up with the fluctuating market trends.
similar_products.features:
SurveySparrow's Market Research Software helps steer your marketing strategies in the right direction. 

Target your ideal audience across channels viz. web, mobile, social & email. Gauge Market Pulse periodically with scheduled surveys & reports. 

With advanced reporting filters, uncover critical research insights to stay ahead of competition & keep up with fluctuating market conditions.

Integrate with the top marketing tools & achieve a seamless workflow. Experience true automation.

similar_products.short_desc: Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for marketing agility. Get rapid insights to build your brand.
similar_products.features:
Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for insights professionals, marketers and agencies who want to test, learn and move faster.

The platform is built on a foundation of industry-leading expertise and proven methodologies, delivering results in hours, not days via best-in-class dashboards. It features a range of consumer insights tools including validated research solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily buy, send & track digital gift card rewards with Giftbit. Use our web app for individual or bulk rewards, or integrate via API.
similar_products.features:
Use Giftbit to send and track digital gift cards for your rewards and incentive needs. Buy at face value & track individually, or in bulk through our easy-to-use web application. Prefer to automate? Trigger via the apps you already use, or integrate directly with our API.

Giftbit is simple, and easy to use. Upload your recipients, customize your reward email and choose from over 50 merchant brands to offer. Get stats on everything you need to monitor the success of your program.

similar_products.short_desc: Collaborative survey platform for survey design, data collection, analysis & reporting. Available in hosted and on-premises versions.
similar_products.features:
Snap Surveys offers Snap XMP, a collaborative online survey platform for survey design, data collection, feedback management, and advanced analysis and customized reporting.
Create engaging, measurable experiences - surveys, forms, evaluations, and more. Design in any survey mode - online, mobile, offline, and scannable paper surveys - in any language. 
Host surveys using Snap Online for secure survey management or install the On-Premises Server Edition to host surveys on your own server.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, but industry strength cloud based mobile, online, CAPI and CATI platform for the professional Market Research industry.
similar_products.features: Nfield is a powerful cloud based data collection platform for professional market research organizations. It features all you need to conduct high quality, professional and secure surveys. Nfield is available for CAPI and Online interviewing. Nfield is delivered as a service: hosted and managed by NIPO Software. For you this means: no servers, no licenses and no IT costs. NIPO Software takes care of running the IT infrastructure and making sure the platform is available 24x7.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Satisfaction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Satisfaction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
